text: Thomas Francis Dorsey Jr. (November 19, 1905 â€“ November 26, 1956) was an American jazz trombonist, composer, conductor and bandleader. He was an important person in swing music. His theme song was "I'm Getting Sentimental Over You". He is best known for "Opus One", "Song of India", "Marie", "On Treasure Island", and his biggest hit single, "I'll Never Smile Again". Dorsey died on November 26, 1956 in Greenwich, Connecticut after choking in his sleep, aged 51. ==References== Category:1905 births Category:1956 deaths Category:Deaths from choking Category:American jazz musicians Category:American bandleaders Category:American trombonists Category:American conductors Category:Musicians from Pennsylvania
title: Tommy Dorsey
